title: Control Buttons Overview
content:
The Control Buttons section provides quick access to common projector operations.

## Default Buttons

**Power On** (Green)
- Turns the projector on
- Takes 30-60 seconds for warm-up
- Status Panel shows "Warming Up" progress

**Power Off** (Red)
- Turns the projector off
- May show confirmation dialog
- Takes 60-90 seconds for cool-down

**Input Source** (Blue dropdown)
- Switch between HDMI1, HDMI2, VGA, etc.
- Available options depend on your projector
- Current input shown in Status Panel

**Blank Screen** (Yellow)
- Temporarily hides projected image
- Click again to restore
- Faster than power off for brief pauses

## Optional Buttons

If enabled in Settings:
- **Freeze Display** - Pauses projected image
- **Volume Control** - Adjust audio level
- **Mute Audio** - Toggle sound
- **Picture Mode** - Switch display modes
- **Aspect Ratio** - Change screen ratio

## Customizing Buttons

1. Open **Settings** (Ctrl+,)
2. Go to **UI Buttons** tab
3. Check/uncheck buttons you want visible
4. Click **Apply**

> **Tip:** Only enable buttons you use regularly to keep the interface clean.

> **Note:** All buttons remain accessible from the system tray menu even if hidden.
